task_description: Implement critical gaps and high-value features from BOOKSHELF_SCANNER_LESSONS.md for swiftwing repository only. Focus on: 1) Image preprocessing pipeline (contrast, brightness, denoising, rotation detection), 2) SSE disconnection detection with backend cleanup, 3) Review queue UI for low-confidence books, 4) Progressive results UX with segmented image preview. Coordinate with existing Epic 5 refactoring work. Exclude wingtip repository from all changes.
critic_notes: All 5 critical issues resolved. Minor note: Task 5/6 have slight build dependency (ProcessingItem properties) - executor should move 3 properties from Task 6 to Task 5 or combine commits.
